Posts.Content: Did anyone diagnose u with osteosclerosis(hardening of the bones/bones with to much calcium)?  Have u developed any masses/tumors to your jaw? Have u had any further jaw problems or exposed bones. In my case i have and a mass gets larger every month and exposed necrotic jaw bones on both sides of my lower jaw. No one knows what to do to help me. Some say surgery, some say absolutley no surgery. Do u have any suggestions>
Posts.Title: Jaw Bone Problems
